alert.note: Alert for Graves (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 03 at 6:49AM EST until March 03 at 7:45AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CST FOR CENTRAL GRAVES COUNTY... At 548 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wingo, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mayfield, Sedalia, Wingo and Water Valley. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 9 and 33. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
